primary.english: {user} is a primary user with {count} aliases,
primary.na'vi: {user} lu txin ulte {count}a stxo lu poru,

unknown_alias.english: {alias} does not currently exist as an alias or known user.

aliasparentset.english: {newParent} is now the parent user, and {newAlias} is an alias.
aliasparentset.na'vi: {newParent} lu sa'sem set ulte {newAlias} lu stxo set nìteng.

unprimary_error.english: One of those users isn't currently recorded as a primary user.

merged_users.english: {old_user} and their aliases have been merged into {new_user}.
